scripts.build: mkdir public/; cp src/index.html public/; esbuild src/app.tsx --bundle --minify --outfile=public/app.js
scripts.build:dev: mkdir public-dev; cp src/index.html public-dev/; esbuild src/app.tsx --bundle --sourcemap --outfile=public-dev/app.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build; git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy:recreate: git push origin -d gh-pages; npm run deploy
